attributes.action: We would like to call early general election due to ongoing unresolved issues.
attributes.additional_details: We, the people have been wholly misrepresented and let down by the current Labour party. Our people are suffering, economy stagnant and yet we see nothing being done to run the country properly. We have had enough.
attributes.background:
Question the Labour party publically on all broken election pledges, the 22bn black hole increased to 100bn, since they started, and where's the thriving economy to deal with it?
If unsatisfactory answers are given, call a vote of no confidence in the Labour party on behalf of the UK population.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
